Hi there! I'm Anna

I love working with and learning about new technologies and programming languages, especially through open-source projects! I do a little art on the side and I almost always have some sort of project going (whether or not it’s listed here yet).

When it comes to programming, I love solving problems. Be it maintaining a project, or making something new.. it always draws me in; if there's a problem to be solved, you'll find me interested in working on it. I do often have a preference for working with databases, the server side, or on standalone desktop applications; I essentially prefer backend development by definition (as evidenced by this website I'll still do frontend though).


Find Me Online

Codeberg

My Codeberg account, this is where I keep most of my repos and the majority of my projects

Github

My GitHub account, I mostly keep my older projects here, however if the project calls for github specifically then it will be here. An example are my packages for the Pulsar editor



Featured projects are listed on my homepage or, you can look through all of my projects at my projects page!

If you find an issue with the website, feel free to make a bug report on the GitHub ! You can also view the source code at: github.com/Purple-Fox-Coder/plutonia.org
